Macro.Name: PowerOn
Macro.MacroValue: (A:PARTIAL PANEL ELECTRICAL, bool) (A:PARTIAL PANEL AVIONICS, bool) or not

GaugeText.GaugeString: %((A:Trailing edge flaps left percent,percent) d 0 == if{ 'UP' quit } 100 == if{ 'DOWN' quit } '///' )%!s!

Update.Script: (@g:mfd NavButton pressed) 0 > if{ (@g:mfd NavButton pressed) ++ s0 (>@g:mfd NavButton pressed) l0 6 > if{ 0 (>@g:mfd NavButton pressed) } }

Expression.Script: 0 (L:SelectedNav2, number) 1 == (A:PARTIAL PANEL NAV:1, bool) or (A:PARTIAL PANEL NAV:2, bool) ! and if{ 19 }
